name: RNPgReactNativeSdkBridge
summary: The Cashfree React SDK allows you to integrate Cashfree Payment Gateway into your application and start collecting payments from your customers. It opens the payment page in a webview. The Cashfree SDK has been designed to minimise the complexity of handling and integrating payments in your React Native project.
